explanation: [0-0] The video starts with a split-screen. The upper part of the screen shows a bathroom scene with a triangular yellow object and a pink object floating in the toilet bowl, while a hand appears in the lower right corner of the screen. The lower part shows three young men in front of a blue background, puffing out their cheeks and trying hard not to laugh. The man on the left is wearing a red hooded sweatshirt, the man in the middle has a black headband on his head, wears glasses, a black and green shirt, a black watch on his left wrist, and has tattoos on his arms. The man on the right is wearing a black duck-tongue cap and a gray short-sleeved T-shirt.

[0-4] Next, a man in a black top appears in the upper part of the screen, bending over and reaching into the toilet bowl. The screen then switches to a blonde woman in a green dress talking to the camera while gesturing with her hand. The black text "hehe" and five laughing emojis appear in the upper part of the screen. She laughs, and the text above changes to "it's not "hehe"" in black, along with two emojis with red hearts and two little girls with wings.

She stands in the room, holding a can of potato chips in her left hand and reaching into the can with her right hand, which has tattoos on her arm.
